definitions: in a way that is too attractive and tempting to be resisted

examples.text: men are irresistibly attracted to her
their eyes were drawn irresistibly back to the house

shortDefinitions: in way that is too attractive and tempting to be resisted

definitions: in a way that is too powerful or convincing to be resisted

examples.text: I am irresistibly reminded of the advice of a friend of mine

shortDefinitions: in way that is too powerful or convincing to be resisted
